underlying_goal: To update a configuration file to use the most powerful available LLMs for specific tasks, and to verify the correctness of their API identifiers.
friction_detail: Claude initially assumed an API model ID for GPT-5.2 Pro which was incorrect. After being prompted by the user to verify, it found and corrected the mistake.
primary_success: Systematically updating the model configuration based on user requests, using web search to inform model selection, and finally verifying and correcting all API model identifiers to ensure correctness.
brief_summary: The user requested an upgrade to the most powerful models in a configuration file. Through an iterative process, Claude updated the models, used web search to select the best options, and enabled specific features. After being prompted to double-check, it verified and corrected the API model identifiers, resulting in a correct and up-to-date configuration.
